title: Magnolia Jazzband - 2001 - A Lovely Way To Spend An Evening FLAC
description:
Magnolia Jazzband - 2001 - A Lovely Way To Spend An Evening

The Magnolia Jazz Band has been one of the top New Orleans-style groups in Norway since its birth in 1972. The reason for the combo's success is obvious when listening to this CD, for the septet excels at a variety of tempos, grooves, and idioms within the New Orleans style. The opening "When My Dreamboat Comes Home" sounds like a New Orleans marching band, while some of the other songs swing more conventionally. Among the high points are "Roses of Picardy," "C'est Magnifique," "I Love You," and "Move the Body Over." The excellent musicianship, strong solos, and particularly the joyous group spirit make this a trad band well worth hearing. (AllMusic)

Track list:
01. When My Dreamboat Comes Home
02. Canal Street Blues
03. A Lovely Way To Spend An Evening
04. Float Me Down The River
05. Roses Of Picardy
06. Yellow Dog Blues
07. I'm Through With Love
08. C'est Magnifique
09. Without You For An Inspiration
10. I Love You
11. Bewitched, Bothered And Bewildered
12. Move The Body Over

Enjoy and share!
